name: Forest Glade
description:
Every time you play the game you will have a different age and sex. This and other random variables will make each playthrough different.

There are 13 endings, but you will have to be a certain age and sex to get all of them.

A lot in this game has been left to chance, as this game was apart of the MigJam #7. This theme for this Jam is All Luck No Skill. This game took me 1 week to make.

Ill put a list down here with everything luckbased in this game:

  • The stats with which you spawn (Age and sex). Based on these you get different height, speed, jump and dialog which result in different endings.
  • Every minute or so there are random events that happen. There is a 33% chance it happens every minute, and you will notice it while playing the game (no spoilers).
  • Certain actions you do can fail. Sometimes based on your stats, but sometimes its just pure luck. When you suddenly die of something, youre just unlucky.

So remember, when something doesnt work the first time, it could work the second time, you never know

The music in this game is all custom made, except for the dance music in the cinema. That was made by Mokka: https://www.youtube.com/@MokkaMusic

If you have any questions, bugs or feedback, leave them in the comments. Enjoy the game and have fun!
